header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: JCalculator
s1.p: Nilesh Raghuvnashi created this and it took almost no effort to adapt it to Jesktop. It license? Well its "Free" as Nilesh put in an email to us. That's about as short as it gets for open source declarations.

s1.title: License
s1.p:
"Witten by Nilesh Raghuvnashi
Made freely available without copyright.."
